text: John Charles Bisby (4 December 1876 – 1945) was an English professional footballer who played as a wing half. ==References== Category:1876 births Category:1945 deaths Category:People from Rawmarsh Category:English footballers Category:Association football wing halves Category:Kilnhurst Colliery F.C. players Category:Sheffield United F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Denaby United F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: John Bisby
